TopicTitle: Unity 4.6 is about to end support, what will the devs do now?

Articles.Content:
-snip-

Edited September 25, 2015 by logan2611
Should have done some research XD
Um my thoughts are this thread is rather pointless because KSP will soon be Unity 5.2 So why ask if the devs need to do anything different?

1.1 (next release) will be on Unity 5, so I don't think there's any problem.

Plus, the current version of Unity (4.6.4) has proven to be able to hand KSP pretty well. Any issues concerning the game is most likely not related to the engine, so I think we can spend a little time without Unity 4.6 support
Closing to save any further embarrassment for Logan.
